sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a trapezium.
message_1: A trapezium has parallel sides of lengths 8cm and 14cm and non parallel sides of lengths 10cm and 12cm. Find the perimeter of the trapezium.
message_2:
To find the perimeter of the trapezium, we simply need to add the lengths of all four sides together.

Perimeter = length of side 1 + length of side 2 + length of side 3 + length of side 4

The given lengths of the sides are 8cm, 14cm, 10cm, and 12cm.

Perimeter = 8cm + 14cm + 10cm + 12cm
Perimeter = 44cm

So, the perimeter of the trapezium is 44cm.
